title: MY COMPUTER STUCK WHEN I ARRIVE TO THE BASE
body: After i picked my champ and saw all the team mates at the beginning i am arriving to the base. After 3 seconds the game freezes and the pc too (the only way to get out is to shut down the pc) + i cant type any key on the keyboard. I hear strange voices like something is stuck. What can i do to fix that problem? i tried to reinstall the game without success. can u pls answer me mates?

replies.body:
A recent Windows Anniversary update went out for Windows 10 that enabled the Game DVR feature in the Xbox Game Bar. This has been causing PC freezes for some players, so I recommend [completely disabling the game bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) to see if it resolves the issue for you.

Let me know if this helped.

I made a post on reddit as to all the solutions that I currently know of to fix this issue:

https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/52cmjq/windows_10_anniversary_update_crash_fixes/
